Class TrainingSession

hr.ekufrin.training.model.TrainingSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
Schedulable
public class TrainingSession extends Session implements Schedulable
Represents a training session.

  • Constructor Details

    • TrainingSession

      public TrainingSession(Long id, String name, LocalDateTime dateTime, Integer duration, User trainer, Integer maxParticipants, String location, SessionStatus status, Set<User> participants)
      Constructs a new TrainingSession with the given id, name, dateTime, duration, trainer, maxParticipants, location, status and participants.
      Parameters:
      id - - unique identifier of the training session
      name - - name of the training session
      dateTime - - date and time of the training session
      duration - - duration in minutes of the training session
      trainer - - trainer of the training session
      maxParticipants - - maximum number of participants of the training session
      location - - location of the training session
      status - - status of the training session
      participants - - participants of the training session

  • Method Details

    • displayDateTime

      public String displayDateTime()
      Returns the date and time of the training session in the format "dd.MM.yyyy. HH:mm".
      Returns:
      - date and time of the training session

    • sessionStatus

      public void sessionStatus()
      Updates the status of the training session. If the current time is after beginning of the session + duration, status is set to FINISHED. If the number of participants is equal to the maximum number of participants, status is set to FULL. Otherwise, status is set to SCHEDULED.
      Specified by:
      sessionStatus in interface Schedulable
